attributes.additional_details: Too many lives are being taken and if there was more support then I’m sure we would see a difference
attributes.background: I would like more mental health support

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding for NHS mental health services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581222

Increase funding for Child and Adolescent Mental Health Services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575532

Continue Government funding for national mental health campaigns: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562359

Immediately fund local services to prevent mental health pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557313
